pages.text: If you are going to be stuck without iron for a while, you may want to know how to light fire. There are a few options available to you. One is to stand outside during a thunderstorm and hope the lightning strikes perfectly on your spot. If you aren't so ~lucky~, see the following pages.

pages.title: Flint Fires
pages.text: Smashing rocks, but more specifically striking flint. If you hold a piece of flint in both of your hands and right click, you can create a fire. This can be used to light the $(machines/beehive_oven)Beehive Oven Pit$() or the $(machines/charcoal_pit)Charcoal Pit$() or just a forest fire. By default it is a 30% (config option) chance to lose the flint used.
The standard way, nothing has changed
Identical to a flint and steel except much more durability.
